text:
I’m worried about bullying, discrimination & stigmatization. What’s the best way to talk about #COVID19?

Here’s what you can do:
- Do not attach location or ethnicity to the disease.
- Do not repeat or share unconfirmed rumours 
- Avoid using language designed to generate fear https://t.co/2Q31nNJM7k
